images.caption: Figure 1:Example prompts to MIDI-RWKV (above) and other multi-track infilling systems[7,8,9,10](below). Measures to infill are outlined in red, the full context window in green. These examples are smaller than those the model sees during training and evaluation for space reasons.
Figure 3:Evaluation of attribute control effectiveness. Left: Average absolute difference between real and intended note density. Right: Success rate of categorical control tokens.
